title: New: Panama Wedding – All of the People (Savoir Adore Remix)
body:
Brooklyn’s **Savoir Adore** offer up the first official remix of one of this years top singles, **Panama Wedding’s** _All of the People_.

Twisting the vocals and centring the track even more around the killer hook; if you’re heading to CMJ next week, this will undoubtedly be the sound of the after-parties. Check out the remix below, and the original underneath that, and be sure to catch **Panama Wedding** at our [official CMJ showcase](https://www.facebook.com/events/291239217684187/).
